title: President grieved over deaths caused by heavy rains in Quetta
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 5 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday expressed grief over the loss of lives caused by the heavy rains in Quetta.
The president prayed for peace for the departed souls and strength for the bereaved families to bear the loss with fortitude.
He also asked the authorities concerned to provide all possible assistance to the people hit by the rains.
